"Begin5008":
"Oh, it's you guys!
Can you help me a bit here?
There's quite a lot of hostiles here."

"Well done, you've been really helpful!
I expect no less from the excellent folks of ARKS.
When I was younger I used to aid my partner's crises….."

"Urrgh…..
It's difficult to keep going with my aged body.
Apologies, but I am going to have to retreat. "

"With just an injury like this, I used to…...
……collapse, possibly. "

"Joseph! Stand up!
Our mission is still incomplete! "

"/mn18 /ci2 5 おお！　君達か！
少し手伝ってくれないか。
いささか敵の数が多くてな。"

"/mn15 /ci2 3 t5 よくやってくれた、助かったぞ！
さすがは優秀なアークス諸君だ。
私も若いころは仲間の危機に……"

"/mn1 むぐぅ……
これ以上は老体には厳しい……
すまんが、私たちは撤退させてもらう。"

"/mn13 私もかつてはこの程度の傷で……
……倒れていた気もする。"

"/toge /mn36 /ci3 4 ジョーゼフ！
立ち上がるのだ！
まだ任務が完了していないぞ！"
